summary: A compilation of scenes featuring some of the best-known comics from the silent era in their best films.
cast: Stan Laurel|Ward Wilson|Oliver Hardy|Will Rogers|Carole Lombard|Jean Harlow|Ben Turpin|Harry Langdon|Charley Chase|Billy Bevan|Andy Clyde|Harry Gribbon|Edgar Dearing|Madalynne Field|Thelma Hill|Madeline Hurlock|Edgar Kennedy|Daphne Pollard|Al St. John|Ford Sterling|Dwight Weist|Vernon Dent|Kewpie Morgan|John J. Richardson|Mack Sennett
title: The Golden Age of Comedy
